jhelp.gui

Class JHelpTextSplit

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • jhelp.gui.JHelpTextSplit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class JHelpTextSplit
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    Label with image, and texts above, left, right and or bellow the image
    Author:
    JHelp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
